name: Ancient Jewels: Cleopatra
description:
New awesome jewels matching game with 80 levels and a lot of bonuses and fun!

The sequel to the great and extremely popular match3 jewel game is here! For all fans of our great Ancient Jewels game devoted! The Egyptian ruler, Cleopatra, who is celebrated for her beauty and intelligence, reveals her mysteries to you. Take part in this addictive and thrilling jewel adventure and discover Cleopatra's treasures!
The game task is to destroy all stone tiles. Form the chain of three or more jewels of the same color by clicking at one figure and drag to other adjacent figures of the same color and all of them will disappear. If there is a stone tile under the figure from the chain it will be destroyed. Enjoy the excellent graphics, melodious music, numerous levels, and various unique fun bonuses in this terrific matching puzzle game!
Main game features:
- 80 levels;
- various bonuses;
- excellent graphics and sound effects;
- smooth and extremely addictive gameplay
